entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is mentioned as the one who made a statement about giving Hogwarts two bites at the apple. She said “Evidently, someone ’oo wished to give ’Ogwarts two bites at ze apple!”

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as agreeing with Madame Maxime and saying he will lodge complaints with the Ministry of Magic and the International Confederation of Wizards.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as growling about Potter not complaining, but then says “funny thin g . . . I don’t hear him saying a word.”

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as someone who should complain because he has the chance to compete.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is mentioned as bursting out and saying “Why should ’e complain?” She says Potter has the chance to compete and they have all been hoping to be chosen for weeks and weeks.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as the school that someone wanted to give two bites at the apple.

relationships.description: Madame Maxime and Karkaroff agree on something, as evidenced by their conversation.
Moody is disagreeing with Potter, as he says “funny thin g . . . I don’t hear him saying a word.”
Fleur Delacour is supporting Potter by saying he has the chance to compete.
